tool.name: Bin Fasta Sequences - Postprocess
tool.help:
**What it does**
Given a binned set of fasta data from the associated "Bin Fasta Sequences" tool, this will separate those into separated Fasta files that can be processed separately.
::
# Round IDX Bin Idx Sum Feature IDs 0 1 1032 gp_8,gp_2 0 2 910 gp_9,gp_0 0 3 1094 gp_4,gp_5,gp_1 0 4 1097 gp_3,gp_6,gp_7
The output will be a Dataset Collection with individual fasta files:
::
$ cat round_0_bin_1.fa >gp_8 ... >gp_2 ...
